title: Bug splat Bug splat and even more Bugsplat
body:
So story:
I've been playing league since the end of season 4, and I understand that sometimes my PC gives up and bug splats, or riot decides to drop a patch while i'm late night grinding. it happens.

recently, after the pool party update, my game has been bugsplating into the nether realm.

I've been bugsplated every game after the update, 

Game 1:
"what is this garbage song"
'tabs-out' 
'bugsplat' 
shit i broke the game

Game 2:
CS-ing
BUGSPLAT
"new patch?"
no.

game 3: 
opens menu to do some key binding settings.

BUG SPLAT
